es.servicios_1_desc: Entrenamiento de fuerza + clases dirigidas de fitness: Esta opci√≥n combina tus sesiones de fuerza personalizadas con clases dirigidas de cualquier modalidad que te apetezca, como Pilates, Yoga, Zumba, Bodypump o bodybalance y muchas m√°s.  No solo trabajamos la fuerza, sino tambi√©n movilidad, flexibilidad, resistencia, coordinaci√≥n y equilibrio para que tu cuerpo se desarrolle de manera equilibrada y completa. Es ideal para quienes quieren un entrenamiento variado y eficaz, que no se quede solo en levantar peso sino que integre todos los aspectos del movimiento y del bienestar f√≠sico.
es.servicios_2_desc: Combinaci√≥n de varios estilos y modalidades a tu preferencia: Con esta modalidad puedes crear tu propia rutina mezclando diferentes tipos de entrenamiento y ubicaciones seg√∫n tus necesidades y preferencias. Por ejemplo, podemos entrenar fuerza en el gimnasio, otro d√≠a a la semana o al mes, hacer una clase de pilates u cualquier otra modalidad al aire libre y despu√©s completar otra sesi√≥n online desde casa, si por ejemplo, no tienes tiempo de desplazarte o est√°s de viaje o simplemente porque te apetece. Tambi√©n puedes combinar distintas modalidades en el mismo entorno si lo prefieres. Esta opci√≥n te permite entrenar de manera completamente personalizada, flexible y variada, adaptando cada sesi√≥n a tus objetivos, tu nivel y tus gustos, para que nunca te aburras y siempre saques el m√°ximo provecho de tus entrenamientos.
es.servicios_3_desc: Esta modalidad te permite combinar sesiones presenciales con entrenamiento online, adapt√°ndose a tu nivel, objetivos y disponibilidad. El entrenamiento online es ideal para quienes no pueden desplazarse, tienen horarios ajustados, est√°n de viaje o simplemente quieren mayor comodidad, mientras que las sesiones presenciales permiten trabajar fuerza, t√©cnica y movilidad con correcci√≥n directa.</br>Combinando ambos formatos puedes crear un plan flexible, variado y personalizado, por ejemplo: entrenar fuerza en el gimnasio, hacer una clase al aire libre y complementar con otra sesi√≥n online, asegurando entrenamientos efectivos y motivadores sin importar d√≥nde est√©s.
es.servicios_4_desc: Con esta modalidad puedes combinar sesiones en espacios abiertos y en gimnasio, adaptando tu entrenamiento a tus objetivos y preferencias. Entrenar al aire libre te permite conectar con la naturaleza, respirar aire fresco y moverte de forma m√°s libre y din√°mica, mientras que las sesiones en gimnasio te permiten trabajar fuerza, t√©cnica y movilidad con todo el equipamiento disponible.</br>La combinaci√≥n de ambos entornos hace tus entrenamientos m√°s variados, completos y motivadores, y te da la flexibilidad de elegir d√≥nde entrenar seg√∫n el d√≠a, tu energ√≠a o incluso el clima.

en.extra: Extra: Fitness classes, group activities, specific preparation for sports or physical tests and rehabilitation (inquire for price without obligation)
en.servicios_desc: A variety of classes and activities tailored to your goals.
en.servicios_3: Strength training + fitness group classes of any modality
en.servicios_4: Combination of various styles and training modalities to your preference
en.servicios_1_desc: Strength training + fitness group classes: This option combines your personalized strength sessions with group classes of any modality you like, such as Pilates, Yoga, Zumba, Bodypump or bodybalance and many more. We not only work on strength, but also mobility, flexibility, endurance, coordination and balance so that your body develops in a balanced and complete way. It is ideal for those who want a varied and effective workout that does not just focus on lifting weights but integrates all aspects of movement and physical well-being.
en.servicios_2_desc: Combination of various styles and modalities to your preference: With this modality you can create your own routine by mixing different types of training and locations according to your needs and preferences. For example, we can do strength training at the gym, another day of the week or month, take a pilates or any other modality class outdoors and then complete another online session from home, if for example, you don't have time to travel or are traveling or simply because you feel like it. You can also combine different modalities in the same environment if you prefer. This option allows you to train in a completely personalized, flexible and varied way, adapting each session to your goals, your level and your tastes, so that you never get bored and always get the most out of your workouts.
en.servicios_3_desc: This modality allows you to combine in-person sessions with online training, adapting to your level, goals and availability. Online training is ideal for those who cannot travel, have tight schedules, are traveling or simply want more convenience, while in-person sessions allow you to work on strength, technique and mobility with direct correction.</br>By combining both formats you can create a flexible, varied and personalized plan, for example: train strength at the gym, take a class outdoors and complement it with another online session, ensuring effective and motivating workouts no matter where you are.
en.servicios_4_desc: With this modality you can combine sessions in open spaces and in the gym, adapting your training to your goals and preferences. Training outdoors allows you to connect with nature, breathe fresh air and move more freely and dynamically, while gym sessions allow you to work on strength, technique and mobility with all the available equipment.</br>The combination of both environments makes your workouts more varied, complete and motivating, and gives you the flexibility to choose where to train depending on the day, your energy or even the weather.
en.programas_desc: Train anywhere: outdoors, at home, gym or online. Fully customized sessions adapted to your goals, with equipment included and guided support.
en.cta_desc: No matter your level or starting point. At ROFIT I guide you step by step with personalized training.
en.servicios_extra_desc: I offer a wide range of classes such as Pilates, Zumba, Crosstraining, Yoga, BodyPump, physical preparation, pregnancy and rehabilitation.
en.nutricion_desc: I offer basic nutrition guidance to complement your training.
en.contacto_desc: Questions? Fill out the form and I will reply as soon as possible.
